prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon with fluffy white wings and a bright blue body.
Show me an adorable Pokemon that resembles a cloud with cheerful features.
Imagine a small, flying Pokemon with a soft blue appearance and white accents.
Design a Pokemon that combines the colors of the sky and clouds into a cute creature.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon that embodies the essence of a sunny day.
Make a Pokemon that looks like it came from a serene mountain landscape with a blue hue.
Give me a flying-type Pokemon that appears friendly and playful, with a soft color palette.
